sentences.sContent: It’s amazing how closely Brian and Steve resemble each other.
sentences.sCn: 布赖恩和史蒂夫真是惊人地相像。

sentences.sContent: He grew up to resemble his father.

words.tran: 相似；相似之处；相似物；肖像

remMethod.val: re(一再)+sembl(类似)+e→再看还是很像→ 类似

trans.tranOther: to look like or be similar to someone or something
